Text:
hey Daman4Life,
what program do you use to compress your anime, like naruto shippuuden. like from 700mb to about 124mb mp4. yet still keep its 720p quality :)
USE MEdia player Classic, Download K-lite pack.
but how do you compress a file? isnt it just a player?
I mean for the anime USE MPC to watch it.

haha no, VLC works perfectly fine for me to watch anime. I dont need help on how to watch it, i need help on how to make big 720p anime files from taka subs that are 700mb and make them smaller to about 124 mb like you do. I need help on how to make files smaller not how to watch a file :)
